title: Ticket #5692: Mixed-mode tests should not PREFER_IPV4.
description: The mixed-mode tests we're running on RH6 were failing on the stable branch and passing on the master branch because the master branch has PREFER_IPV4 set by default. It's probably a better test of mixed-mode/IPv6 (or at least a more sensitive one) not to do this, since PREFER_IPV4 means we're not really testing any IPv6 code paths.
check_ins: 2016-May-31 13:32   Check-in [48451]: (#5692) Add PREFER_IPV4 = FALSE to mixed-mode test configuration. (By Todd L Miller )
creator: tlmiller
